attributes.action: Stop the NHS trial of puberty blockers on children.
attributes.additional_details: No child can possible give informed consent to such an experiment in chemical mutilation, altering their lives in ways that cannot be reversed. This is the kind of 'medical' experimentation banned under the Nuremberg Code.
attributes.background: Parliament should force the NHS to abandon its plans to test puberty blockers on 220 children.

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Cancel the clinical trial into puberty blockers & safeguard vulnerable children
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751839
